component.name: PMDO
component.summary: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon fangame for desktop computers

description.p: In Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Origins, you control a team of Pokémon, and explore Guildmaster Island. Your goal is to reach the fabled summit, and earning the right to lead a guild yourself. You will find many other teams with similar goals and stories. Befriend wild Pokémon with apricorns to add them to your team, and build an assembly of Pokémon worthy of reaching the top!
